roadmaps_tenant_isolation.name: roadmaps_tenant_isolation
roadmaps_tenant_isolation.using: board_id IN (SELECT id FROM boards WHERE organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true))
roadmaps_tenant_isolation.withCheck: board_id IN (SELECT id FROM boards WHERE organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true))

comment_reactions_tenant_isolation.name: comment_reactions_tenant_isolation
comment_reactions_tenant_isolation.using:
comment_id IN (
  SELECT c.id FROM comments c
  JOIN posts p ON c.post_id = p.id
  JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id
  WHERE b.organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)
comment_reactions_tenant_isolation.withCheck:
comment_id IN (
  SELECT c.id FROM comments c
  JOIN posts p ON c.post_id = p.id
  JOIN boards b ON p.board_id = b.id
  WHERE b.organization_id = current_setting('app.organization_id', true)
)
